display_long_description: Another Gorilla is a thrilling VR experience that drops you into the oversized knuckles of a gorilla on the run. Set in a stylized city where humanity watches your every move, you must climb, swing, smash, and survive in a world that doesn’t understand you. Whether you’re scaling skyscrapers, throwing cars, or dodging tranquilizers, every moment is physical, chaotic, and fun. The intuitive locomotion system uses your real-world arms for movement, letting you feel every leap and punch. But you’re not alone—other gorillas, drones, and strange tech stand in your way. Will you escape, fight, or find a new kind of freedom? Packed with humor, action, and primal power, Another Gorilla redefines what it means to go bananas in VR. It’s more than a game—it’s a wild journey through instinct, rebellion, and bananas. Lots of bananas.
